Class AlgTape 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----AlgTape
public class AlgTape
extends Object
AlgTape.java stores ordered frames of animation.

Version:
99.3.1
Author:
Brian Maltzan

AlgTape()

append(AlgFrame)
appends an AlgFrame to the end of the sequence of frames.
current()
return current frame
get_first()
return first frame in the sequence, and sets current frame to first.
get_last()
return last frame in the sequence, and sets current frame to last.
get_num_elements()
return number of frames.
is_first()
if at least 1 frame exists, returns whether is first in sequence.
is_last()
if at least 1 frame exists, returns whether is last in sequence.
main(String[])
next()
returns next frame.
prev()
returns previous frame.
reset_current()
reset, as if no frames have yet been called
set_data(AlgFrame)
replaces current frame.
toString()

AlgTape 
 public AlgTape()

append 
 public void append(AlgFrame o)
appends an AlgFrame to the end of the sequence of frames.

set_data 
 public void set_data(AlgFrame o)
replaces current frame.

next 
 public AlgFrame next()
returns next frame. if frames have not been retrieved or at last frame, returns null.

prev 
 public AlgFrame prev()
returns previous frame. if frames have not been retrieved or at first frame, returns null.

get_last 
 public AlgFrame get_last()
return last frame in the sequence, and sets current frame to last.

get_first 
 public AlgFrame get_first()
return first frame in the sequence, and sets current frame to first.

reset_current 
 public void reset_current()
reset, as if no frames have yet been called

current 
 public AlgFrame current()
return current frame

get_num_elements 
 public int get_num_elements()
return number of frames.

is_last 
 public boolean is_last()
if at least 1 frame exists, returns whether is last in sequence. else returns true.

is_first 
 public boolean is_first()
if at least 1 frame exists, returns whether is first in sequence. else returns true.

toString 
 public String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class Object
main 
 public static void main(String args[])
